sense.def:
Kadar ladja
is launched
, jo prvič spustijo v morje.

To launch a rocket, missile, or satellite
pomeni poslati raketo, izstrelek ali satelit v zrak ali vesolje.

seg.quote: Soviet rockets launched more satellites into orbit.
They gave only a few minutes' warning of the missile launch.

sense.def:
To launch a large and important activity
pomeni začeti obsežno ali pomembno dejavnost, na primer politično gibanje ali vojaški napad.

seg.quote: The government has launched a massive literacy campaign.

sense.def:
Kadar neko podjetje
launches a new product
, napravi neki nov izdelek dostopen javnosti.

seg.quote: A magazine called ‘The Week’ was launched in January 1964.
We are already selling millions of copies just one year after the launch.

sense.def:
A launch
je velik motorni čoln.

To launch into a speech, fight, or other activity
pomeni navdušeno začeti govor, boj ali kako drugo dejavnost.

cit.quote: lotiti se, zagnati se v kaj
